comment: Equivalence of the Axiom of Choice (first form) of [Enderton] p. 49 and our Axiom of Choice (in the form of ~ ac2 ). The proof does not depend AC on but does depend on the Axiom of Regularity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-May-2015.)
